feature.title: Integrate Environment
feature.detail: Go beyond code, syntax-highlighting, close an unused block, smart completions for the best exclusive experience.

feature.title: Crafted by Specialists
feature.detail: Over 400 problems designed and curated by specialists. To deliver the most comprehensive learning experience possible.

feature.title: Trusted by thousands
feature.detail: Join other 10,000 to craft, learn and practice, on one of the best data-structure and algorithms solving platform.

list.title: Google Code Jam
list.detail: Put your coding skills to the test as you work your way through multiple rounds of algorithmic coding puzzles for the title of Code Jam Champ and 15,000 USD.

list.title: Microsoft Imagine Cup
list.detail: Global competition that empowers the next generation of computer science students to team up and use their creativity, passion and knowledge of technology.

list.title: Google Code In
list.detail: Google's contest introducing 13-17 year old pre-university students to open source software development.

list.title: Tortoise and Hare
list.detail: Floyd's "tortoise and hare" cycle detection algorithm, applied to the sequence 2, 0, 6, 3, 1, 6, 3, 1

list.title: Permutation Sort
list.detail: Randomly Shuffle an entire array until it completely sorted.

list.title: Red Black Tree
list.detail: Every node is either red or black. Every leaf (NULL) is black. If a node is red, then both its children are black.

list.title: Instant Sort
list.detail: The fastest sorting algorithm ever with the speed of O(1).

interactiveShowcase.title: Trusted by communities.
interactiveShowcase.detail: Data-structure and Algorithms is one of the essential potential in both software development and competitve programming. Our goal of programming.in.th is to help you get better in competitive programming, that's why there's over 10,000 programmers have enrolled.

showcase.title: Integrated Development Environment
showcase.detail: Beyond the thought, environment of programming.in.th is perfectly crafted for integrated development environment which result a perfect workspace for solving and experimenting an algorithm without a help of a code editor.

showcase.title: Exclusive Dashboard with Data-Science Analytic
showcase.detail: At Programming.in.th, we care about your progression. That's why we created a data-science level analytic just for Competitive Programming progression for you to determined your next step.

join.title: Learn together
join.detail: We got you cover and help you get better for learning, experiencing and experimenting. Over 10,000 developers all over the community has joined Programming.in.th and sharpen their skills.
